overview: When the young Alonso decides to look for the garment of his beloved, the beautiful but tiresome Beatriz, in the Monte de las Ánimas, very strange things will happen... Who will be able to live without a horrible crime? Yes, very strange things will happen...  A key piece of Romanticism, this film does not live up to the homage of its literary original, but the intention is what counts...
tagline: The craziest souls in the world are arriving!
title: The Spirits´ Mountain
